decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The vehicle crossover and hard standing shall be constructed with pedestrian visibility splays as shown on the approved plan "Dropped Kerb and Driveway Access Plan showing intervisibility splays" (received 24 August 2007). The visibility splays shall be 1.5 metres wide on both sides of the crossover with no obstruction over 600mm in height.  REASON:  To ensure the safe and efficient movement of vehicles to and from the subject site while not endangering pedestrians, in accordance with policy 9.1 of the adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan: "Plan for the Environment" 2004.
description: Dropped kerb and hard standing in front garden.
